ayah: May the hands of Abū Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.[2008]
footnotes: [2008] Abū Lahab (the Prophet's uncle) , who was an enemy of Islām.

ayah: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.
He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.[2009]
footnotes: [2009] She used to put thorns in the Prophet's path and slander him (ﷺ) . The word "firewood" was used by the Arabs to allude to slander and backbiting.

ayah: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
